sentiment_score_definition.0: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish

relevance_score_definition.0: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.
